scripts.build:artifacts:tac:dev: cd artifacts/dev/l2-evm && npm i && npx hardhat compile && rsync -avh --delete ./artifacts ./scripts ./typechain-types ../tac/internal/
scripts.build:artifacts:ton:dev: cd artifacts/dev/l1_tvm_ton && npm i && npm run compile:ts && npm run build:all && rsync -avh --delete ./build ./wrappers ../ton/internal/
scripts.build:artifacts:tac:testnet: cd artifacts/testnet/l2-evm && npm i && npx hardhat compile && rsync -avh --delete ./artifacts ./scripts ./typechain-types ../tac/internal/
scripts.build:artifacts:ton:testnet: cd artifacts/testnet/l1_tvm_ton && npm i && npm run compile:ts && npm run build:all && rsync -avh --delete ./build ./wrappers ../ton/internal/
scripts.build:artifacts:tac:mainnet: cd artifacts/mainnet/l2-evm && npm i && npx hardhat compile && rsync -avh --delete ./artifacts ./scripts ./typechain-types ../tac/internal/
scripts.build:artifacts:ton:mainnet: cd artifacts/mainnet/l1_tvm_ton && npm i && npm run compile:ts && npm run build:all && rsync -avh --delete ./build ./wrappers ../ton/internal/
scripts.build:artifacts:ton:all: yarn build:artifacts:ton:dev && yarn build:artifacts:ton:testnet && yarn build:artifacts:ton:mainnet
scripts.build:artifacts:tac:all: yarn build:artifacts:tac:dev && yarn build:artifacts:tac:testnet && yarn build:artifacts:tac:mainnet
scripts.build:artifacts: yarn prebuild && yarn build:artifacts:ton:all && yarn build:artifacts:tac:all
